About universAAL LDDI KNX network driver

This bundle connects to a UPD Multicast Channel on the local IP network where KNX bus messages can be sent and received. Usually a KNX/IP Gateway is used to connect the UDP Multicast Channel to the KNX bus system. The base source code is taken from the DOG2 project on http://domoticdog.sourceforge.net and slightly modified to run standalone.
